Posts.Content: cathybudd7 wrote: I am 65 years old and have some insurance through medicare. Having a bi-lateral mastectomy this Friday. 1/7/11.  Will need chemo 2 weeks after surgery.  My insurance will not cover the chemo drugs.  Have applied at different cancer sites for financial assist. What do I do if $ not there for chemo?  My oncologist office tells me the $ has to b paid at time of IV therapy. Dx 10/2010, DCIS, Stage II, 1/6 nodes, HER2+ Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: insurance for chemo cathybudd7 DiDel
